latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: A Survey on Livelihood System of Rural Household in the Philippines

dsDescriptionValue.value: The study examines the changes in the livelihood of the rural household that comprises data on household's basic information, migration, landholdings, costs and return of rice production, sources of income, borrowing, lending, assets holding, decision making in farming, calamity and accident and the coping mechanism, Integrated Pest Management (IPM), formal and informal relationship with different agencies/institutions, and about trust and sociability.

keywordValue.value: Land value, sources of income, decision making,  formal and informal relationship with different agencies, and trust and sociability.

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 1,053;

value: Laguna, Nueva Ecija, and Iloilo provinces
